I also get this when right clicking on the top-level tree item in the debug 
view.  Severe!

This was due to a bug in ObjectContribtuion when there are no entries in the 
menu. Fixed in the current HEAD stream.

Tod, I've got a similar stack trace elsewhere, and you may want to confirm if 
it's the same bug.

In the packages view, you can now expand JAR files in a project.  

1) Expand a JAR file to the file META-INF/MANIFEST.MF
2) Double click on this file.  Nothing happens
3) Now right click.  Exception occurs:
